text: Eén tegen 100 is a Dutch game show. It has been airing since 3 September 2000 on various channels with Caroline Tensen as host. The game pits a single contestant against 100 other people for a chance to win a larger cash prize. It is sponsored by the Nationale Postcode Loterij (National Postal Code Lottery). Category:Television game shows
title: Eén tegen 100
